translation.zh: 国防秘密行动局 招募和管理特工

translation.en: Not a single demerit.
translation.zh: 完全没有污点

translation.en: [chuckling] I mean...
translation.zh: 拜托…

translation.en: so then the inspector general sticks you on a dock
translation.zh: 然后监察长把你派到了一个码头上

translation.en: to watch a guy who just wants to retire?
translation.zh: 盯梢一个只是想退休的人

translation.en: That doesn't bother you?
translation.zh: 你不会困扰吗？

translation.en: Well, this is adios, Henry.
translation.zh: （鹈鹕角 酒吧和烧烤） 该道别了 亨利 很高兴能监视你

translation.en: -It's been nice surveilling you. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 该道别了 亨利 很高兴能监视你

translation.en: I'll probably be sent somewhere else tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天我可能会被派去别的地方了

translation.en: Well, you, uh, you want a ride home?
translation.zh: 要捎你回家吗？

translation.en: No, thanks, my apartment is just right over there.
translation.zh: 不用 谢了 我的公寓就在那边

translation.en: Henry, why are you retiring?
translation.zh: 亨利 你为什么要退休？

translation.en: I'm finding myself avoiding mirrors lately, so...
translation.zh: 我最近发现自己不敢照镜子

translation.en: I'm gonna take that as a sign.
translation.zh: 我觉得那是个征兆

translation.en: -You watch your six out there. -You, too.
translation.zh:
-你自己小心
-你也是

translation.en: Night, Toast.
translation.zh: 晚安 糊妹

translation.en: [woman] You should come look at the stars, Jack.
translation.zh: 来看看星星 杰克

translation.en: -We have to work on your kick. -[woman] Charlie!
translation.zh:
-你得多练习踢腿
-查理

translation.en: -Concentrate, Henry. -Come on!
translation.zh:
-专心点 亨利
-别这样

translation.en: You're five now, and this isn't hard. Now, try again.
translation.zh: 你都五岁了 这并不难 再来

translation.en: [Jack] Hi, this is Jack. I'm sailing.
translation.zh: 你好 我是杰克 我在航海

translation.en: Please tell me this means we're back in business.
translation.zh:
拜托告诉我
这意味着我们重出江湖了

translation.en: [Henry] Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪里？

translation.en: -Just some goddamn surveillance. -[Henry] Get out of there, now.
translation.zh:
-在做该死的监控任务
-快离开那里

translation.en: Do not go home. Do not go to your girl's house.
translation.zh: 别回家 别去你女友家

translation.en: Go to the bus station.
translation.zh: 去车站

translation.en: -Get a ticket in cash. -[whispers] Shit.
translation.zh:
-用现金买张车票
-该死

translation.en: [Henry] Do not use an ATM. Go somewhere
translation.zh: 别用提款机 去一个

translation.en: where nobody knows you. [Marino] You sure?
translation.zh:
-没人认识你的地方
-你确定？

translation.en: They're outside my window. I'm sorry, man.
translation.zh:
他们就在我的窗户外
抱歉 伙计

translation.en: -I made you a loose end. -[Marino] Come on, man. I'll be fine.
translation.zh:
-我让你也成了目标
-别这样 我不会有事

translation.en: -How do I get in contact with you? -You don't.
translation.zh:
-我怎么跟你联系？
-不联系

translation.en: Don't contact anybody. Especially anybody from the DIA.
translation.zh: 谁也别联系 尤其是防情局的人

translation.en: -And get rid of your phone. Now. -[Marino] Nah. Come on, Henry, man. Stop--
translation.zh:
-现在就把你的手机扔了
-不行 别这样 亨利 别…

translation.en: Marino?
translation.zh: 马里诺

translation.en: -[breathes heavily] -[Henry] It's not gun time. It's coffee time.
translation.zh:
现在不是用枪的时候
现在是喝咖啡的时间

translation.en: Do you have a burn bag?
translation.zh: 你有机密文件销毁袋吗？

translation.en: -First tell me what you're doing here. -Somebody just sent a team to kill me.
translation.zh:
-先告诉我你来这里做什么
-有人刚派了一队人来杀我

translation.en: And you're still asleep.
translation.zh: 而你还在睡觉

translation.en: So, that means you didn't know about it, correct?
translation.zh: 说明你并不知情 对吧？

translation.en: No, of course not. I would've told you.
translation.zh: 我当然不知道 不然我肯定会告诉你

translation.en: That means you're next. Get dressed.
translation.zh:
这说明下一个就是你了
穿好衣服

translation.en: All the boats have dupe keys in the office, right?
translation.zh: 那些船都有备用钥匙在办公室吧？

translation.en: -Got a fast one? -[crickets chirping]
translation.zh: 有快艇吗？

translation.en: Feeling the call of the sea?
translation.zh: 感受到大海的召唤了吗？

translation.en: Where is he? You can tell me now--
translation.zh: 他在哪里？你可以现在告诉我

translation.en: -[grunts] -Hey! Drop-- [grunts]
translation.zh: 放下…

translation.en: Bitch!
translation.zh: 贱人

translation.en: You can tell me now,
translation.zh: 你可以现在告诉我 或者等五分钟后

translation.en: or you can tell me in five minutes minus your teeth.
translation.zh: 你可以现在告诉我 或者等五分钟后 你少了几颗牙再说 反正你会告诉我

translation.en: -[Danny groaning] -But you're gonna tell me.
translation.zh: 你少了几颗牙再说 反正你会告诉我

translation.en: I counted three. How many did you bring?
translation.zh: 我数到有三声 你带了几个人？

translation.en: Who sent you? [pants]
translation.zh: 谁派你来的？

translation.en: You can tell me now or you can tell me in five minutes...
translation.zh: 你可以现在告诉我 或者等五分钟后

translation.en: minus your teeth.
translation.zh: 你少了几颗牙再说

translation.en: [Henry] You good?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: -[Danny grunts] It's Lassiter. -[Henry] How do you know?
translation.zh:
-是拉西特
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: If you get on this boat, you're leaving behind everything
translation.zh: 如果你上了这艘船 你就要抛弃 你认识的一切人和事 你明白吗？

translation.en: and everybody you've ever known. Do you understand that?
translation.zh: 你认识的一切人和事 你明白吗？

translation.en: Scared is good. Means you're alert.
translation.zh: 害怕是好事 说明你很警觉

translation.en: Never had anybody try to kill me before.
translation.zh: 我还从来没被追杀过呢

translation.en: Yeah, well, the important thing is he didn't.
translation.zh: 重点是他没杀成

translation.en: -[boat engine starting] -What scares you? Other than bees?
translation.zh: 你怕什么 除了蜜蜂

translation.en: Drowning.
translation.zh: 溺水

translation.en: [Clay] So this is you cleaning up your own messes.
translation.zh: 你就是这么收拾自己的烂摊子

translation.en: Spare me the lecture.
translation.zh: 别跟我说教了

translation.en: It's like watching the Hindenburg crash into the Titanic.
translation.zh: 这就像看着兴登堡号撞上泰坦尼克号

translation.en: Tell me what we're going to do about Henry.
translation.zh: 告诉我 我们要怎么处理亨利

translation.en: Henry Brogan is like any other soldier.
translation.zh: 亨利布洛根和其他士兵一样

translation.en: When they're young and stupid, they believe anything you tell them.
translation.zh:
他们年轻而愚昧时
你说什么他们都信

translation.en: Then they get older. They wear out.
translation.zh: 然后他们会变老 会老化

translation.en: Grow a conscience.
translation.zh: 会渐渐生出良知

translation.en: This is why we need a new breed of soldier.
translation.zh: 所以我们需要新品种的士兵

translation.en: Gemini will handle this.
translation.zh: 这件事双子座会处理

translation.en: -I'm sorry, I can't allow that. -I'm not asking your permission.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 我不能允许
-我不是在征求你的同意

translation.en: You wanna go to your bosses?
translation.zh: 你想去见你的上司们吗？

translation.en: I'm sure they'd love to hear about our little rogue project.
translation.zh: 他们肯定很想听听我们的叛变项目

translation.en: I'll make it look like a Russian hit. You give Henry a state funeral.
translation.zh:
我会做得像俄国人干的
你给亨利安排国葬

translation.en: Flag on the coffin, 21-gun salute.
translation.zh: 棺材上覆盖国旗 鸣枪21响

translation.en: You give a nice speech. Everyone cries.
translation.zh: 你念个感人的致辞 大家都会哭

translation.en: He'll be remembered as a hero. Life goes on.
translation.zh:
他会作为英雄被铭记
生活会继续下去

translation.en: -Not for Henry. -Oh, come on.
translation.zh:
-亨利的生活不会了
-得了吧

translation.en: Mutts like Henry were born to be collateral damage.
translation.zh: 亨利这样的杂碎生来就是当炮灰

translation.en: Let's not pretend otherwise.
translation.zh: 咱们就别假装不是这样了

translation.en: [Janet] Do you have an asset in place? [Clay] I have the perfect asset.
translation.zh:
-你有特工就位了吗？
-我有最完美的人选

translation.en: [Danny] All right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -[Henry] Just-- -All right, I'm good.
translation.zh:
-就…
-好了 我没事

translation.en: You hungry?
translation.zh:
-你饿吗？
-饿死了

translation.en: Yeah, I'm starving, but those things expired three years ago.
translation.zh:
-你饿吗？
-饿死了 但那些东西三年前就过期了

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Still taste good.
translation.zh: 还是挺好吃的

translation.en: While he still had teeth, that guy said you were the rogue.
translation.zh: 那人还有牙的时候 他说你叛变了

translation.en: And you believed him?
translation.zh: 你相信他？

translation.en: Ninety-nine percent sure he was lying.
translation.zh: 99%确信他是在说谎

translation.en: That one percent sucks, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 剩的那1%很折磨人 对吧？

translation.en: Henry, has this ever happened to you before?
translation.zh: 亨利 你身上发生过这种事吗？

translation.en: Which part?
translation.zh: 哪部分？

translation.en: Your own government trying to kill you.
translation.zh: 你自己的政府想杀你

translation.en: Nah, that's new.
translation.zh: 没有 这是新鲜事

translation.en: You've been Agency a while. Can't you guess what this is all about?
translation.zh:
你在局里也有一阵子了
你能猜到是为了什么吗？

translation.en: Trust me, if I could, I would not be on this lovely vacation with you.
translation.zh:
相信我 如果我能猜到
我就不会跟你一起度这个假了

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: when I'm head of the Agency, we're gonna handle retirement very differently.
translation.zh: 等我当上局里的老大 我们可不会这么对待退休员工

translation.en: My man.
translation.zh: 好兄弟

translation.en: [Baron] Baron Tours here to pick up Brogan, party of two!
translation.zh: 巴隆旅行社来接布洛根 两位乘客

translation.en: -[Henry] Good to see you, man. -You, too.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你 伙计
-我也是

translation.en: Danny, meet the Baron. Middle-aged reprobate,
translation.zh: 丹妮 这是巴隆 中年堕落人士

translation.en: and best pilot I've ever known. Danny, Baron.
translation.zh:
也是我认识的最棒的飞行员
丹妮 巴隆

translation.en: Hey, Toast.
translation.zh: 你好 糊妹

translation.en: Got your burners, as requested.
translation.zh: 按你的要求给你们弄了一次性电话

translation.en: For now, you can hole up in my place in Cartagena.
translation.zh: 目前你们可以躲在我在卡塔赫纳的家

translation.en: You'd be anonymous and safe.
translation.zh: 没人认识你们 很安全

translation.en: Uh, yeah, we're kinda in the shit here, man.
translation.zh: 现在情况有点糟 伙计

translation.en: I think Jack is dead.
translation.zh: 我觉得杰克死了

translation.en: -Jesus. -[Henry] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-是啊

translation.en: -Anyone follow you? -Nah.
translation.zh:
-有人跟踪你吗？
-没有

translation.en: They will. Let's go.
translation.zh: 早晚的事 我们走

translation.en: -Can I have one of those crackers? -[Danny] Sure.
translation.zh: 我能吃点饼干吗？

translation.en: [Baron] Thanks.
translation.zh:
-当然可以
-谢了

translation.en: [principal] Does he do this at home?
translation.zh: 他在家也这样吗？

translation.en: -I don't think so. I don't know. Do you? -No.
translation.zh:
应该不会吧 我不知道 -你会吗？
-不会

translation.en: [principal] If it's inappropriate to do this sort of thing at home,
translation.zh: 如果你知道在家做这种事不合适

translation.en: why would you think it's appropriate -to do it in your science class? -[cell phone buzzing]
translation.zh:
你为什么认为在科学课上做
就合适呢？

translation.en: I don't know. Probably because science is so wicked boring.
translation.zh: 说不好 可能是因为科学特别无聊吧

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: [Henry] Guess you really didn't want me to retire.
translation.zh: 我猜你是真不想让我退休

translation.en: -Henry, you're okay! [chuckles] Thank God! -[Henry] Stop it.
translation.zh: 亨利 你没事 太好了 少来

translation.en: Is Marino dead?
translation.zh: 马里诺死了吗？

translation.en: [Del] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Jack Willis?
translation.zh: 杰克威利斯呢？

translation.en: [Del] It wasn't me. None of this was me, Henry. I swear.
translation.zh: 不是我 都不是我干的 亨利

translation.en: -I trusted you, Del. -[Del] You still can.
translation.zh:
-我发誓
-我信任过你 德尔 你仍然可以相信我
我换个号码打给你

translation.en: Let me call you on another line.
translation.zh:
你仍然可以相信我
我换个号码打给你

translation.en: 604-555-0131. You got 30 seconds.
Um, hey, excuse me. Could I borrow your phone
translation.zh: 不好意思 要是我给你一百块

translation.en: for five minutes if I give you a hundred bucks?
translation.zh: 能把你的手机借我用五分钟吗？

translation.en: We'll start with whose idea it was to send a team to Agent Zakarewski's apartment.
translation.zh:
我们先说说是谁下令
派了一队人去扎卡维斯基的公寓

translation.en: -Was that necessary? -Also not my call.
translation.zh:
-有那个必要吗？
-那也不是我的决定

translation.en: She's working for the inspector general, not me. Is she with you?
translation.zh:
她是检察长的手下 不是我的手下
她和你在一起吗？

translation.en: Yes. Not voluntarily.
translation.zh: 对 但不是自愿的

translation.en: [Del] Okay, listen. This is not something I wanna say over the phone.
translation.zh: 好 听着 我不想在电话里说这个

translation.en: -I'm at my kid's goddamn school. -What the hell is all of this?
translation.zh: 我在我孩子的学校里 这都是怎么回事？

translation.en: We have a problem.
translation.zh: 我们有个麻烦

translation.en: Gemini.
translation.zh: 双子座 你的老友

translation.en: Your old friend, working with Janet Lassiter and her people.
translation.zh: 跟珍妮特拉西特一伙人合作

translation.en: I can't stop them.
translation.zh: 我没法阻止他们

translation.en: Okay. Dormov.
translation.zh: 好吧 多尔莫夫

translation.en: Did-- did he have something to do with Gemini?
translation.zh: 他和双子座有关吗？

translation.en: Dormov, the guy that you had me pop on the train,
translation.zh: 多尔莫夫 你说他是俄国恐怖分子

translation.en: because you said he was a Russian terrorist.
translation.zh: 让我在他坐火车时把他干掉了

translation.en: Was he working for Gemini?
translation.zh: 他曾为双子座效力吗？

translation.en: [Del] Once upon a time.
translation.zh: 曾经是

translation.en: So you got me pulling... triggers for Clay Verris.
translation.zh: 所以你让我替克莱瓦里斯杀人了

translation.en: [Del] Henry, I regret my lack of candor, but listen--
translation.zh: 亨利 我也后悔不够坦诚 但是…

translation.en: How many other times you do this to me, Del?
translation.zh: 你还骗过我多少次 德尔？

translation.en: How many times you spike a file,
translation.zh: 你篡改过多少次档案

translation.en: send me off to AMF somebody who didn't deserve it?
translation.zh: 让我去杀那些罪不至死的人？

translation.en: Never ever. This was a one-off. I swear on my son's life.
translation.zh:
从没有过 只有这次
我以我儿子的命发誓

translation.en: All right. Look, Agent Zakarewski is not a part of this.
translation.zh: 好吧 扎卡维斯基探员与此事无关

translation.en: Henry, we can fix this, I swear. But I need both of you to come back.
translation.zh:
亨利 我们能解决的 我发誓
但我需要你们俩都回来

translation.en: To what, Del?
translation.zh: 回去什么下场 德尔？

translation.en: Okay. Gemini. What do you know about it?
translation.zh:
-好 双子座
-你对它知道多少？

translation.en: Privatized paramilitary owned by Clay Verris.
translation.zh: 克莱瓦里斯的私人准军事组织

translation.en: Agency does a lot of business with them. Is there more?
translation.zh:
局里经常与他们合作
还有别的吗？

translation.en: Baron and I served under Verris in the Marines.
translation.zh: 巴隆和我在海军时是瓦里斯的手下

translation.en: Uh, Panama, Kuwait, Somalia.
translation.zh: 巴拿马 科威特 索马里

translation.en: After he left the military, he started Gemini,
translation.zh: 他退役之后 成立了双子座

translation.en: and tried to hire us. We both told him no.
translation.zh: 想雇用我们 我们都拒绝了

translation.en: Except I was smart enough to move 1,500 miles away.
translation.zh:
不过我够聪明
搬到了2400公里之外

translation.en: Yeah. -I blew that one. -[dramatic music playing]
translation.zh: 是啊 我搞砸了

translation.en: [Henry] Verris gets billions of dollars a year
translation.zh: 瓦里斯不择手段除掉目标

translation.en: to take out targets any way he sees fit.
translation.zh: 以此每年获利数十亿美金

translation.en: That's Gemini. Off-book kidnappings, tortures.
translation.zh: 双子座就是做这个 暗中绑架 折磨

translation.en: They're who you call when you need 12 Saudi princes to quietly disappear
translation.zh: 要是你需要让12名沙特王子 无声无息地消失

translation.en: or you want somebody to train your death squads.
translation.zh:
或是想找人训练你的敢死队
联系他们就行

translation.en: Six weeks into sniper school,
translation.zh: 学了六周的狙击后

translation.en: Clay Verris takes me out on this boat about five miles.
translation.zh: 克莱瓦里斯带我上船开出海八公里

translation.en: Ties these weights to my ankles, tosses me overboard,
translation.zh: 在我脚上捆了重物 把我推下船

translation.en: tells me tread water as long as I can.
translation.zh: 让我能踩水多久就踩多久

translation.en: -And he didn't know about your fear of-- -Of course he did. That was the point.
translation.zh: 他不知道你害怕… 他当然知道 就是因为这个

translation.en: So what did you do?
translation.zh: 那你做了什么？

translation.en: I tread water for as long as I could.
translation.zh: 我踩水 踩到踩不动

translation.en: And then I drowned.
translation.zh: 然后我溺水了

translation.en: Dead.
translation.zh: 死了

translation.en: He fished me out, paddled my chest.
translation.zh: 他把我捞上去 按压我的胸膛

translation.en: Told me I was now ready to serve under his command.
translation.zh: 跟我说我准备好为他效力了

translation.en: [Baron] A toast.
translation.zh: 来一杯

translation.en: To the next war...
translation.zh: 敬下一次战争

translation.en: -which is no war. -[Henry] Which is no war.
translation.zh:
-永远不会发生
-永远不会发生

translation.en: [Danny] No war.
translation.zh: 永远不会发生

translation.en: [Henry] Yeah. We'll figure it out in the morning. -Right now, we could use some shut-eye. -Sure.
translation.zh:
我们早上再想办法
现在我们都需要休息一下

translation.en: -Uh, you folks want one room or-- -Two.
translation.zh: 没问题 你们要一间房还是… 两间

translation.en: Two. Two.
translation.zh: 两间…

translation.en: Well, yeah. I can put him in the garage if you want.
translation.zh: 行 你愿意的话我可以让他睡车库

translation.en: [Henry] All right, two rooms will be fine.
translation.zh: 行 两间就可以

translation.en: [Baron] Just giving you options. Okay, right this way.
translation.zh: 就是让你们选一下 行 这边走

translation.en: Sniper. Rooftop. I leave, he's gonna follow.
translation.zh:
狙击手 屋顶
我离开 他会跟上来

translation.en: I need you to go with Baron someplace safe.
translation.zh: 我要你和巴隆去安全的地方 好吗？

translation.en: Shooter. On the roof.
translation.zh: 枪手 在屋顶上

translation.en: You're a shitty house guest, you know that?
translation.zh: 你真是个要命的客人 知道吗？

translation.en: -How the hell did they find us? -She's good.
translation.zh:
-他们怎么找到我们？
-她是好人 真的是好人

translation.en: She's really good. She just doesn't know what she doesn't know.
translation.zh:
-他们怎么找到我们？
-她是好人 真的是好人 她只是不了解内幕

translation.en: Take care of her, all right?
translation.zh: 好好照顾她 行吗？

translation.en: -All right. -[suspenseful music continues]
translation.zh: 行

translation.en: [Henry] Stop right there!
translation.zh: 站住

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: I don't want to shoot you!
translation.zh: 我不想朝你开枪

translation.en: [Junior] Fine.
translation.zh: 行

translation.en: Don't shoot me. Mind if I shoot you?
translation.zh: 别朝我开枪 介意我朝你开枪吗？

translation.en: I could've killed you on the roof!
translation.zh: 刚刚在屋顶上我本可以杀了你

translation.en: [Junior] Maybe you should have.
translation.zh: 也许你是该杀了我

translation.en: Did they show you a picture of me?
translation.zh: 他们给你看我的照片了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You look old.
translation.zh: 嗯 你看着好老

translation.en: Kid... you take one step closer...
translation.zh: 小子 你再走近一步

translation.en: you're gonna leave me no choice.
translation.zh: 我就别无选择了

translation.en: -Stop! Stop! Stop! -[gunshot firing]
translation.zh: 放开…

translation.en: [Henry] Move! Move!
translation.zh: 让开…

translation.en: [Henry] Get out of the way!
translation.zh: 别挡路

translation.en: -[car honking] -[Henry] Out of the way!
translation.zh: 别挡路

translation.en: [Henry] Stop! Stop! Stop!
translation.zh: 停…

translation.en: [policeman] Hands up!
translation.zh: 举起双手

translation.en: Who the hell was that?
translation.zh: 那到底是谁？

translation.en: [policeman] Brogan.
translation.zh: 布洛根

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢 先生

translation.en: -Thank you, Captain. -[captain] No problem.
translation.zh:
-谢谢 队长
-不客气

translation.en: Your place is burned. Get me somewhere I can see him coming.
translation.zh:
你家已经暴露了
给我找个视野开阔的地方

translation.en: [Baron] I wanted to go in there guns blazing,
translation.zh: 我想持枪闯进去

translation.en: but she thought the diplomatic approach made more sense.
translation.zh: 但她觉得用外交手段更合理

translation.en: [Henry] Yeah, gunfire might've been kinder.
translation.zh: 是啊 开枪可能更亲切点

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Great work in there.
translation.zh: 做得不错

translation.en: -[Baron] What now? -I need you to get me to Budapest.
translation.zh: 现在怎么办？ 我要你送我去布达佩斯

translation.en: -[Baron] What's in Budapest? -[Danny] What's in Budapest?
translation.zh:
-布达佩斯有什么？
-布达佩斯有什么？

translation.en: Jack's informant... Yuri.
translation.zh: 杰克的线人 尤里

translation.en: Uh, these guys aren't... trying to kill me because I want to retire.
translation.zh: 他们追杀我不是因为我要退休

translation.en: They're coming after me because they think Jack
translation.zh:
他们追杀我
是因为他们认为杰克告诉了我

translation.en: told me something classified. Yuri ought to know about it.
translation.zh: 机密信息 尤里应该知道这事

translation.en: I'm sorry, partner, my Aztec doesn't have that kind of range.
translation.zh:
抱歉 搭档 我的阿兹特克
飞不了那么远

translation.en: Well, I was hoping we'd borrow something that does.
translation.zh: 我希望能借一架飞得了的

translation.en: Maybe a G?
translation.zh: 比如湾流飞机

translation.en: Taking someone's Gulfstream?
translation.zh: 借人家的湾流飞机？

translation.en: I mean, you-- you'd really have to love a guy to do that.
translation.zh: 得是真爱才能借得出吧

translation.en: I know just the feller. Give me a minute.
translation.zh: 我刚好认识这么一个人 等我一下

translation.en: -♪ I got a woman ♪ -[Baron] ♪ I got a woman ♪ -♪ Way over town, that's good to me ♪ -♪ Way over town, that's good to me ♪
translation.zh: 我在镇上有个女人 她对我很好

translation.en: -[Baron] ♪ Oh, yeah ♪ -♪ Oh ♪
translation.zh: 噢耶

translation.en: -[Baron] ♪ I got a woman ♪ -♪ I got a woman ♪ -[Baron] ♪ Way over town ♪ -♪ Way over town ♪ -♪ That's good to me ♪ -♪ That's good to me ♪
translation.zh: 我在镇上有个女人 她对我很好

translation.en: -♪ Oh, yeah ♪ -♪ Oh, yeah ♪
translation.zh: 噢耶

translation.en: -♪ She give me money ♪ -♪ She give me money ♪
translation.zh: 她给我钱

translation.en: -♪ When I'm in need... ♪ -♪ When I'm in need... ♪
translation.zh: 每当我有难时…

translation.en: [Danny] Henry?
translation.zh: 亨利

translation.en: Did you ever have a kid?
translation.zh: 你有孩子吗？

translation.en: [Henry] No. Why?
translation.zh: 没有 怎么了？

translation.en: Guy on the motorcycle.
translation.zh: 骑摩托那个人

translation.en: Did you notice anything funny about him?
translation.zh: 你注意到他有什么奇怪的地方吗？

translation.en: -I noticed he was very good. -Right.
translation.zh:
-我注意到他非常厉害
-对

translation.en: And the face?
translation.zh: 他的脸呢？

translation.en: Similarity?
translation.zh: 相似之处？

translation.en: Yeah, I noticed that, too. -[Danny] So... -[spray hissing]
translation.zh:
-我也注意到那点了
-那么…

translation.en: ...you never had a long-term relationship?
translation.zh: 你从未有过长期情人吗？

translation.en: No. Not unless we count you.
translation.zh: 没有 除非把你算上

translation.en: Is it possible that you could've had a kid without knowing it?
translation.zh: 有没有可能你有个孩子但不知道？

translation.en: [Henry] No.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: -Then how do you explain-- -Danny.
translation.zh:
-那你怎么解释…
-丹妮

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: Thank you, by the way.
translation.zh: 顺便 谢谢你

translation.en: For?
translation.zh: 谢什么？

translation.en: For leaving Baron's apartment so I wouldn't be a target.
translation.zh: 你离开巴隆的公寓 好让他不瞄上我

translation.en: Coming to get me in Georgia when you could've just run for your life.
translation.zh:
在乔治亚时 你可以自己逃命
却来接我了

translation.en: I just...
translation.zh: 我只是想把你送上一架私人飞机

translation.en: wanted to put you on a private plane, and give you a free trip to Hungary.
translation.zh: 我只是想把你送上一架私人飞机 免费送去你去匈牙利

translation.en: Where I'm gonna find...
translation.zh: 我在那里能找到…

translation.en: Hungarians.
translation.zh: 匈牙利人

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: When I saw him...
translation.zh: 我看到他时…

translation.en: it was like I was seeing a ghost.
translation.zh: 仿佛看到了一个鬼魂

translation.en: A ghost with a gun.
translation.zh: 一个持枪的鬼魂

translation.en: Like... every trigger I've ever pulled.
translation.zh: 就像我枪下的每一个鬼魂

translation.en: [Clay] I told you to stay in Colombia and await orders.
translation.zh: 我让你留在哥伦比亚待命

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我想和你谈谈

translation.en: [Junior] He's very good.
translation.zh: 他非常厉害

translation.en: He's the best.
translation.zh: 他是最厉害的

translation.en: That's why I sent you.
translation.zh: 所以我才派了你

translation.en: He knew every... move of mine before I made it.
translation.zh: 他提前料到我的每一个动作

translation.en: I'd have him... right there, and I'd take the shot...
translation.zh: 我本来能抓住他 我能开枪

translation.en: and... he'd be gone.
translation.zh: 然后他就会死

translation.en: Like a ghost.
translation.zh: 就像一个鬼魂

translation.en: Did you get a look at his face?
translation.zh: 你看到他的脸了吗？

translation.en: Not really. I-- I saw him up the stairs, through a dirty mirror.
translation.zh:
没看清 他站在楼梯上面
我在脏镜子里看到了

translation.en: I thought you were on the roof.
translation.zh: 我以为你在屋顶上

translation.en: I was. He got a line on me.
translation.zh: 我本来在 他知道我在那里

translation.en: -I had to jump down. -What do we always drill?
translation.zh:
-我必须跳下来
-我们都是怎么训练的？

translation.en: You hold the high ground. You put his back against the wall,
translation.zh: 你要占据高地 把他逼到墙边

translation.en: and you don't let him go.
translation.zh: 别让他逃掉

translation.en: I know that.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: The whole thing was weird. It was... wiggy.
translation.zh: 整件事都很奇怪 很反常

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: I don't know, it was as if I were... watching it all.
translation.zh: 说不清 就像我是在旁观一样

translation.en: Who is he?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: Junior, this thing that you're struggling with, this strangeness,
translation.zh: 小克 你这种纠结 这种陌生感 这是恐惧

translation.en: it's fear.
translation.zh: 这种陌生感 这是恐惧

translation.en: Don't hate it.
translation.zh: 不要厌恶它

translation.en: Lean into it.
translation.zh: 要依靠它

translation.en: Embrace it, and then overcome it. You... are right on the threshold, son.
translation.zh:
接受它 然后战胜它
你只要跨过这道坎 儿子

translation.en: This close.
translation.zh: 只差一步了

translation.en: You hungry?
translation.zh: 你饿吗？

translation.en: Um... yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Bowl of cereal sound good?
translation.zh: 来碗麦片怎么样？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [man 1] Go!
translation.zh: 上

translation.en: -[man 3] Grenade! -[man 4] Hang on.
translation.zh: 手榴弹

translation.en: [man 5 whistling] Thank you! That's it! Back up!
translation.zh: 谢谢 可以了 回来吧

translation.en: Hurry up!
translation.zh: 快点 大家回到原地

translation.en: -Everybody back to one. -[man 5] Everybody back to one.
translation.zh: 快点 大家回到原地 大家回到原地

translation.en: -[man 6] Back to one! -[man 7] Let's go!
translation.zh: 回到原地 快

translation.en: Lots of new faces.
translation.zh:
-很多新人
-是的

translation.en: They'll be the first boots on the ground in Yemen.
translation.zh: 他们会是第一批踏上也门的人

translation.en: Do they understand the rules of engagement or just, whatever moves, they shoot it?
translation.zh: 他们理解交火的原则吗？ 还是只要看到动的东西就开枪？

translation.en: They're elite. They're disciplined.
translation.zh: 他们是精英 训练有素

translation.en: And if they get a clean shot at their target
translation.zh: 如果能从公寓窗口将目标

translation.en: through an apartment window, they'll take it.
translation.zh: 一击致命 他们会毫不犹豫

translation.en: You should think about that on your way to Budapest.
translation.zh: 你在前往布达佩斯的路上该反思一下

translation.en: Henry's just landed there.
translation.zh: 亨利刚到那里

translation.en: You're moving out.
translation.zh: 你要出发了

translation.en: [Danny] Aniko?
translation.zh: 安妮可

translation.en: Thank you for your time.
translation.zh: 感谢你抽出时间

translation.en: Here are the samples.
translation.zh: 样本在这里

translation.en: This I can do for you in... two days.
translation.zh: 两天后给你结果

translation.en: This I need in two hours.
translation.zh: 我两小时后就要

translation.en: We got a meeting with Yuri.
translation.zh: 我们要和尤里见面

translation.en: He agreed to sit with us.
translation.zh: 他答应和我们谈谈

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I think I know why he's as good as you, Henry.
translation.zh: 我知道他为何像你一样厉害了 亨利

translation.en: He is you.
translation.zh: 他就是你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: There's a DNA lab here. I gave them samples.
translation.zh:
这儿有个DNA实验室
我给了他们样本

translation.en: Yours and the baseball cap he was wearing.
translation.zh: 你的和他戴的那个棒球帽上面的

translation.en: He just-- he looks so much like you, I thought he had to be your son, so I...
translation.zh: 他和你那么像 我以为他一定是你儿子 所以我…

translation.en: They did three tests.
translation.zh: 他们做了三次检测

translation.en: Your DNA and his.
translation.zh: 你和他的DNA

translation.en: All three came back identical.
translation.zh: 三次结果都完全相同

translation.en: Not close. Identical.
translation.zh: 不是相似 是完全相同

translation.en: As in the same person.
translation.zh: 同一个人的相同

translation.en: He's your clone.
translation.zh: 他是你的克隆体

translation.en: They thought I'd made a mistake that I give them the samples
translation.zh:
他们以为我弄错了
给的两个样本都是同一人

translation.en: of the same person, but I didn't.
translation.zh: 但我没有

translation.en: He is you.
translation.zh: 他就是你

translation.en: -How's that even possible? -It's complicated, but it's doable.
translation.zh: 怎么可能？ 很复杂 但可以做到

translation.en: All you'd really need is a surrogate mother,
translation.zh: 只需要一位代孕母亲

translation.en: -and a DNA sample. -If they could clone a person,
translation.zh:
-以及一份DNA样本
-如果他们可以复制人

translation.en: you-- you'd think they'd clone more doctors or scientists,
translation.zh: 他们应该复制更多的医生或科学家

translation.en: not... me.
translation.zh: 而不是我

translation.en: They could've cloned Nelson Mandela.
translation.zh: 他们可以复制纳尔逊曼德拉

translation.en: Nelson Mandela couldn't kill a man on a moving train
translation.zh: 纳尔逊曼德拉无法在两公里之外

translation.en: from two kilometers away.
translation.zh: 杀死行驶中的火车上的人

translation.en: [Baron] Yuri.
translation.zh: 尤里

translation.en: Mr. Brogan.
translation.zh: 布洛根先生

translation.en: [Yuri] Before we begin, I must confess, I have admired your work for many years.
translation.zh: 首先我必须坦白 我久仰你的大名了

translation.en: [Henry] Wait. -So... you know who I am? -[Yuri laughing]
translation.zh: 等等 你知道我是谁？

translation.en: A longtime listener, first-time caller, as they say in your country.
translation.zh:
老听众 首次拨打热线
贵国是这么说的吧

translation.en: I would congratulate you... [grunts] ...on your retirement, but...
translation.zh: 我想祝贺你的退休

translation.en: your last job has loose ends, yes?
translation.zh:
但你的最后一次任务 -没有彻底完成吧 对吧？
-是的

translation.en: Yeah, well, my government lied to me, then tried to kill me
translation.zh:
-没有彻底完成吧 对吧？
-是的 我的政府骗了我 然后想杀我

translation.en: -if that's what you mean. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你是说这个吧？
-是的

translation.en: In Russia, we call that "Tuesday." But Americans...
translation.zh:
在俄罗斯 这就是我们的日常
但是在美国

translation.en: it hurts your feelings.
translation.zh: 你们就伤心了

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: So, why was Dormov trying to go back to Russia and why was I sent to kill him?
translation.zh: 多尔莫夫为什么想回俄罗斯 以及为什么要派我去杀他

translation.en: Yes, down to business. Very American.
translation.zh: 好 开门见山 正宗美国人

translation.en: You are a busy man.
translation.zh: 你是大忙人啊

translation.en: We were both friends with Jack.
translation.zh: 我们都是杰克的朋友

translation.en: He was a good man.
translation.zh: 他是个好人

translation.en: I'm mourning his death, like you.
translation.zh: 我和你一样都为他的死而哀悼

translation.en: But the reason you are here... and I have not killed you...
translation.zh: 但你来这里而我还没杀了你的原因

translation.en: yet...
translation.zh: 暂时还没杀

translation.en: is we share a common enemy.
translation.zh: 就是我们有共同的敌人

translation.en: Clay Verris.
translation.zh: 克莱瓦里斯

translation.en: He lured Dormov to the West, funded his lab.
translation.zh:
他把多尔莫夫骗到西方
资助他的实验室

translation.en: And now you have met the fruits of their labor.
translation.zh: 现在你也见过了他们孕育的果实

translation.en: Dolly the sheep was cloned in '96.
translation.zh: 克隆羊多莉诞生于1996年

translation.en: -But in '95-- -I was the sheep.
translation.zh:
-然而在1995年…
-我是那只羊

translation.en: Take it as a compliment. And you are the only one.
translation.zh: 把这当成是赞美吧 只有你一人

translation.en: With your DNA, Verris raised the boy as his own son.
translation.zh: 瓦里斯把你的克隆体当自己儿子养大

translation.en: Trained him to be the perfect assassin.
translation.zh: 把他训练成完美杀手

translation.en: So why was Dormov trying to leave?
translation.zh: 那多尔莫夫为什么想要离开？

translation.en: For years, we tried to lure him back. Nothing.
translation.zh: 这些年来 我们一直想诱他回来 但都是徒劳 直到去年 他们闹翻了

translation.en: Then last year, they had a falling out.
translation.zh: 但都是徒劳 直到去年 他们闹翻了

translation.en: -Dormov got scared, reached out to me. -So, I--
translation.zh:
-多尔莫夫害怕了 找到了我
-那我…

translation.en: that still doesn't explain why I was sent to kill him.
translation.zh: 你还是没解释为什么我被派去杀他

translation.en: We have indications Dormov made a breakthrough.
translation.zh:
我们有迹象表明
多尔莫夫取得了重大突破

translation.en: Modified human DNA. A path to mass production.
translation.zh: 人类DNA改造 可以批量生产的途径

translation.en: But Dormov wanted soldiers to be stronger, smarter.
translation.zh: 多尔莫夫想要士兵更强壮 更聪明

translation.en: Verris...
translation.zh: 瓦里斯…

translation.en: Verris wanted something else.
translation.zh: 瓦里斯想要的是别的

translation.en: What something else? [Yuri] Mr. Brogan...
translation.zh:
-什么别的？
-布洛根先生

translation.en: you are the best at what you do.
translation.zh: 你是这行最出色的人

translation.en: But still you get tired.
translation.zh: 但你也会疲惫 也有恐惧和怀疑

translation.en: You have fears, doubts. You feel pain, perhaps remorse.
translation.zh: 但你也会疲惫 也有恐惧和怀疑 你会感觉痛苦 或许会懊悔

translation.en: You have a conscience.
translation.zh: 你有良心

translation.en: This makes you human...
translation.zh: 这让你有人性

translation.en: but suboptimal as a soldier.
translation.zh: 但不是最好的士兵

translation.en: Less than perfect.
translation.zh: 不够完美

translation.en: Less profitable.
translation.zh: 不够赚钱

translation.en: Clayton Verris is playing God with DNA.
translation.zh:
克莱顿瓦里斯
利用DNA扮演上帝的角色

translation.en: He must be stopped.
translation.zh: 一定要阻止他

translation.en: If it's that dangerous, why not send a missile?
translation.zh: 如果这么危险 为什么不发射导弹

translation.en: Blow up his lab.
translation.zh: 炸了他的实验室？

translation.en: That is what we're doing.
translation.zh: 我们就是这么做

translation.en: Except you... are the missile.
translation.zh: 只不过现在的导弹是你

translation.en: I wish you luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Oh, one last thing. Your escape from home two days ago? [exhales sharply]
translation.zh:
还有一件事
两天前你从家里逃走那次

translation.en: Amazing work. I was on the edge of my seat.
translation.zh: 真是厉害 我全程都替你紧张

translation.en: Wait. What? How the hell do you know about that?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？你怎么知道这件事？

translation.en: I'm a big fan. What can I say?
translation.zh: 我是你的忠实粉丝啊

translation.en: [Danny] If even half of what he's saying is true... we gotta talk to this kid.
translation.zh:
即使他说的只有一半是真的
我们都要和这个孩子谈谈

translation.en: You're not gonna be safe until you do.
translation.zh: 不然的话你一直都不安全

translation.en: Oh, so you think if your 50 year old self showed up,
translation.zh: 如果你的50岁本体突然出现告诉你

translation.en: and told you you were her clone, that would make you calmer?
translation.zh: 你是她的克隆体 你能冷静下来吗？

translation.en: Fifty-one.
-You know you're 51, Henry? -I'm aware of it.
translation.zh: 随口一说 你知道你51了吧 亨利？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh:
-四舍五入
-好吧

translation.en: He's the mirror you don't want to look into, Henry.
translation.zh: 他是你不愿看的镜子 亨利

translation.en: But he's our best shot at getting to Verris.
translation.zh: 但他是我们找到瓦里斯的最好机会

translation.en: [man] Janet Lassiter? Who wants to know?
translation.zh:
-珍妮特拉西特
-你是谁？

translation.en: Got a message for you, ma'am... from a man who transferred a 1,000 dollars
translation.zh: 我来给你传信 女士 信息来自一个

translation.en: into my Feathercoin account just to make sure you got it. [exhales]
translation.zh: 给我的羽毛币账户转账一千美元的人

translation.en: Does this person have a name?
translation.zh: 这个人叫什么名字？

translation.en: His name is "A 1,000 Dollars Into My Feathercoin Account."
translation.zh:
他叫“给我的羽毛币账户转账
一千美元的人”

translation.en: "Hello, Janet. Before you try to kill me again, consider this.
translation.zh: “你好 珍妮特” “在你打算再杀我之前 考虑一下”

translation.en: Your home address is 1362 Carrol Grove.
translation.zh: “你家地址是卡罗尔街1362号”

translation.en: The security alarm code is 1776.
translation.zh: “安全警报器密码是1776”

translation.en: You awaken at 6:12 every morning,
translation.zh: “你每天早晨6点12分醒来

translation.en: and stop for your decaf soy latte with an extra shot by 6:42.
translation.zh:
6点42分去买一杯加浓低因
豆奶拿铁”

translation.en: Every night you stand in front of your huge living room window,
translation.zh: “每晚你都站在你家客厅的大窗户前

translation.en: sipping a Jose Cuervo margarita...
translation.zh: 喝一杯金快活玛格丽特

translation.en: with Forensic Files on the TV...
translation.zh: 电视里放着《法医档案》

translation.en: wearing your nice, comfy sweatpants."
translation.zh: 身上穿着舒适的家居服”

translation.en: This is Lassiter.
translation.zh: 我是拉西特

translation.en: [Henry] There are shooters at your ten and two.
translation.zh: 你的十点钟和两点钟方向有枪手

translation.en: Get up off of that chair. You will be AMF'ed.
translation.zh: 你胆敢离开那个椅子 就送你归西

translation.en: Now, if I thought the world needed another me, I would've had a kid.
translation.zh: 如果我觉得这世界还需要另一个我 我会生个孩子

translation.en: The program predates my arrival at the Agency. You must know that.
translation.zh:
那个项目在我上任之前就存在了
你要知道这一点

translation.en: Yeah. Perfect D.C. answer. Something goes wrong, duck!
translation.zh:
十足的华盛顿官腔
一有麻烦 自己先撇清关系

translation.en: Tip the bike guy.
translation.zh: 给骑车小伙小费

translation.en: You can go.
translation.zh: 你可以走了

translation.en: [Henry] Now, I have your agent with me against her will.
translation.zh: 现在我劫持了你的探员

translation.en: Danielle Zakarewski. She wants to come in.
translation.zh: 丹妮尔扎卡维斯基 她想回去

translation.en: -[Janet] Fine. -Uh, like me, she is a patriot.
translation.zh: 行 她像我一样是个爱国者

translation.en: Unlike me, she still wants to spend the next couple decades
translation.zh:
与我不同的是她依旧想在
接下来的几十年里

translation.en: scoring touchdowns for you assholes.
translation.zh: 为你们这些混蛋卖力工作

translation.en: Her safety is nonnegotiable.
translation.zh: 她的安全无商量余地

translation.en: [Henry] Ten and two, Janet.
translation.zh: 十点钟和两点钟方向 珍妮特

translation.en: [Barista] Decaf soy latte with an extra shot for Janet.
translation.zh: 珍妮特的加浓低因豆奶拿铁

translation.en: [Henry] The only person I'll turn her over to
translation.zh: 我只会把她交给

translation.en: is the guy you sent after me in Cartagena.
translation.zh: 你们派去卡塔赫纳追杀我的人

translation.en: Don't even think about sending anybody else.
translation.zh: 别想着派别人来

translation.en: Family reunion.
translation.zh: 家人团聚 很温情啊

translation.en: -Very sweet. -Yeah. Keep it up.
translation.zh: 家人团聚 很温情啊 是啊 继续嘴硬

translation.en: You'll be the first person I ever killed for free.
translation.zh: 你会成为我第一个免费杀的人

translation.en: How quickly can you get him to Budapest?
translation.zh: 你能让他多快赶到布达佩斯？

translation.en: [Janet] Five minutes?
translation.zh: 五分钟

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: She'll be in the courtyard of the Vajdahunyad Castle
translation.zh: 今晚12点 沃伊达奇城堡

translation.en: at midnight tonight.
translation.zh: 她会庭院等着

translation.en: Enjoy your latte.
translation.zh: 好好享用你的拿铁吧

translation.en: [Baron] What's AMF? [Danny] "Adios, motherfucker."
translation.zh:
-AMF是什么意思？
-“再见 狗娘养的”

translation.en: [Henry] How the hell does he know we're here?
translation.zh: 他怎么知道我们在这里？

translation.en: This is gonna work, right?
translation.zh: 这会成功的 对吧？

translation.en: Yes. How do you know?
translation.zh:
-是的
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: I know his taste.
translation.zh: 我知道他的喜好

translation.en: Wait, are you saying you're attracted to me?
translation.zh: 等等 你是说你对我有兴趣？

translation.en: Me? Now? Hell, no.
translation.zh: 我？现在的我当然不会

translation.en: But the younger, less-mature version, maybe.
translation.zh: 但年轻又不成熟的我或许会吧

translation.en: When I came for you... in Georgia...
translation.zh: 在乔治亚时我去找你

translation.en: I didn't have to think about that. It was instinct.
translation.zh: 根本就不用思考 那是本能

translation.en: He was born with that, too.
translation.zh: 他也有那种本能

translation.en: Besides, he wants me.
translation.zh: 再说了 他想杀我

translation.en: [Junior] Right.
translation.zh: 右转

translation.en: [Danny] Lovely courtyard.
translation.zh: 庭院真漂亮

translation.en: I'm sorry, ma'am.
translation.zh: 抱歉 女士

translation.en: Before we go any farther, I'm gonna need you to strip.
translation.zh: 继续进行之前 我需要你脱掉衣服

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: I need to be certain you're not wearing a wire.
translation.zh: 需要确定你没带监听器

translation.en: Okay, first of all... "ma'am"?
translation.zh: 好吧 首先 你叫我女士

translation.en: I was raised to respect my elders.
translation.zh: 我受的教育是要尊敬长辈

translation.en: [Junior] Take your clothes off, please.
translation.zh: 请脱掉衣服

translation.en: Turn around, please.
translation.zh: 请转身

translation.en: I see you like to be thorough.
translation.zh: 看来你喜欢做事细致

translation.en: Caution has kept me alive.
translation.zh: 谨慎让我能活命

translation.en: Call his burner.
translation.zh: 打给他的一次性电话

translation.en: -Thank you. -[dial tone beeping]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Henry] Brogan.
translation.zh: 布洛根

translation.en: In 12 minutes, I'm putting two bullets in the back of her head.
translation.zh: 12分钟后 我会对着她后脑开两枪

translation.en: [Henry] Your orders are to deliver her safely.
translation.zh: 你收到的命令是安全交接她

translation.en: My orders are to kill you.
translation.zh: 我收到的命令是杀了你

translation.en: Are you familiar with the Quartz Chamber of the catacombs?
translation.zh: 你熟悉地下墓穴的石英室吗？

translation.en: [Henry] Negative. We're doing this someplace visible,
translation.zh: 不行 要在显眼的地方

translation.en: where I can see you. Now you have 11 minutes.
translation.zh:
-让我能看到你
-现在你只剩11分钟了

translation.en: Get dressed. We're taking a ride.
translation.zh: 穿上衣服 我们开车去

translation.en: [Danny] Cab was a smart move.
translation.zh: 出租车真是聪明的主意

translation.en: Where are you from?
translation.zh: 你来自哪里？

translation.en: Your formality, it's Southern.
translation.zh: 你的礼节 是南方的

translation.en: You know, if you're gonna use me as bait and possibly murder me,
translation.zh: 如果你要拿我当诱饵 还可能杀了我

translation.en: then the least you can do is indulge me in some conversation.
translation.zh: 那你起码能陪我聊几句

translation.en: [Junior] Just outside Atlanta.
translation.zh: 在亚特兰大附近

translation.en: You two have a lot in common.
translation.zh: 你们俩有很多共同点

translation.en: [Junior] I doubt that. You'd be surprised.
translation.zh:
-我表示怀疑
-你会很惊讶

translation.en: You know, I started following him, too. Just like you're doing.
translation.zh:
我最开始也是跟踪他
就像你现在这样

translation.en: Then I got to know him.
translation.zh: 然后我渐渐了解他

translation.en: He's got a big heart, like you.
translation.zh: 他心胸宽广 像你一样

translation.en: What do you know about my heart?
translation.zh: 你怎么了解我的心？

translation.en: I know that you have one.
translation.zh: 我知道你有心

translation.en: And I know that it's telling you that something
translation.zh: 我还知道它在告诉你

translation.en: about the job you've been given isn't right.
translation.zh: 你这次被指派的任务不对劲

translation.en: A job is a job, ma'am.
translation.zh: 任务就是任务 女士

translation.en: [Danny] Wonder how much you paid the custodian.
translation.zh: 真想知道你付了管理员多少钱

translation.en: [Junior] Left.
translation.zh: 左转

translation.en: Undo the chain.
translation.zh: 解开锁链

translation.en: [Danny] Basement.
translation.zh: 地下室

translation.en: -You must really know the city. -[Junior] I watch a lot of Nat Geo.
translation.zh:
-你肯定很了解这个城市
-我经常看《国家地理》

translation.en: -It says "Off-limits." -Ma'am.
translation.zh:
-上面写着禁入
-请

translation.en: Wonder how many people are buried down here.
translation.zh: 真想知道有多少人被埋葬在这里

translation.en: [Junior] Stand over there.
translation.zh: 站在那里

translation.en: [Junior] Go.
translation.zh: 走

translation.en: [Danny] If you knock out all the lights, how are you gonna see
translation.zh: 如果你把灯都熄灭了 出去时怎么看得到自己布置的绊线？

translation.en: your own trip wire on the way out?
translation.zh: 出去时怎么看得到自己布置的绊线？

translation.en: A grenade is no joke. I mean, I get the idea.
translation.zh:
手榴弹可不是闹着玩的
我懂你的想法

translation.en: Darkness neutralizes his biggest strength, and close quarters favors you, right?
translation.zh:
黑暗让他最强的狙击无法施展
近距离对你有利 是吗？

translation.en: I mean, he can't throw a grenade without killing me, too.
translation.zh: 他扔手榴弹会把我也杀死

translation.en: But what if he tries gas? You know, or some sort of sedative agent?
translation.zh: 但如果他用毒气或者某种镇静剂呢？

translation.en: Way ahead of me. Gas mask and night vision.
translation.zh:
原来你早就想到了
防毒面具加夜视镜

translation.en: -Very smart. -[Junior] Over there.
translation.zh:
-聪明
-那边

translation.en: And zip ties! These must be for me.
translation.zh: 还有索带 肯定是给我准备的

translation.en: But can I ask you something?
translation.zh: 但我能问你一件事吗？

translation.en: [Junior] Would you actually stop talking long enough for me to answer?
translation.zh:
你说个不停 真的会给我留出
回答的间隙吗？

translation.en: How much do you know about him?
translation.zh: 你对他了解多少？

translation.en: Anybody tell you why they wanted him dead?
translation.zh: 有人告诉你为什么要杀他吗？

translation.en: [Junior] Guy cracked, killed eight ops in a single night,
translation.zh: 他疯了 一夜之内杀了八名特工

translation.en: -and his spotter. -That's what they told you?
translation.zh:
-还有他的探子
-他们这么告诉你吗？

translation.en: -[Junior] That's what he did. -No.
translation.zh:
-他就是这么做的
-不 并不是

translation.en: No, not exactly. I was there...
translation.zh:
-他就是这么做的
-不 并不是 那些特工被杀那晚我也在场

translation.en: the night all those operatives were hit.
translation.zh: 那些特工被杀那晚我也在场

translation.en: They'd been sent to kill him, and me, by Gemini.
translation.zh: 他们是被双子座派去杀他和我的

translation.en: And not that it matters, but his spotter was shot in Virginia,
translation.zh:
或许这不算什么
但他的探子是在弗吉尼亚被害

translation.en: and the rest of those men went down in Savannah.
translation.zh: 其余人是在萨凡纳丧命

translation.en: Henry can shoot long-distance, but he can't shoot that long.
translation.zh:
亨利确实能远距离射击
但打不了那么远

translation.en: [Danny] Come on. Just think. Does that make any sense to you?
translation.zh: 拜托你想想 你认为这说得通吗？

translation.en: -[tape tearing] -[Danny] Do you understand what I'm saying? It-- it doesn't--
translation.zh: 你明白我在说什么吗？这不…

translation.en: -[Junior] Better. -[muffled] Fuck you!
translation.zh: 好多了 我操

translation.en: [Henry] Get up. Go.
translation.zh: 起来 走

translation.en: Stay right there.
translation.zh: 站住别动

translation.en: -[sighs] Thank you. -[Henry] Here.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-给

translation.en: You know how to light one of those? [Danny] Oh, Jesus, Henry.
translation.zh:
-你知道怎么点吗？
-天啊 亨利

translation.en: Hey, thanks for the tip on the grenade.
translation.zh: 谢谢你提醒我有手榴弹

translation.en: -You were talking to him the whole time. -[Henry] Yeah.
translation.zh: 你一直跟他说话 没错

translation.en: You either search somebody... or you don't.
translation.zh: 搜身要么搜彻底 要么不搜

translation.en: And for the record...
translation.zh: 事先声明

translation.en: I do not want to kill you.
translation.zh: 我不想杀你

translation.en: But I absolutely will if I have to.
translation.zh: 但如果有必要 我绝对会动手

translation.en: What did Clay Verris tell you about me?
translation.zh: 克莱瓦里斯怎么跟你说我的事

translation.en: Okay. Well, let me tell you about him.
translation.zh: 好吧 我跟你讲讲他的事

translation.en: Because I know Mr. Verris very well.
translation.zh: 因为我非常了解瓦里斯先生

translation.en: How'd he start you?
translation.zh: 他怎么开始训练你的？

translation.en: Hunting birds? Rabbit? About 12 years old, moved you up to deer?
translation.zh: 猎鸟 猎兔吗？ 大概12岁时 让你升级为猎鹿？

translation.en: I'm guessing 19, 20 years old
translation.zh: 我猜19或20岁时

translation.en: the first time he ordered you to shoot a person.
translation.zh: 他第一次让你对人开枪

translation.en: Any of this ringing true?
translation.zh: 我说得对吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: He told you to "lean into your fear..."
translation.zh: 他告诉你要“依靠恐惧”

translation.en: because you were "a warrior,
translation.zh: 因为你是战士

translation.en: blessed with great gifts to defend the weak."
translation.zh: 拥有保护弱者的伟大天赋

translation.en: But he couldn't stop the noise...
translation.zh: 但他无法阻止那个声音

translation.en: that secret part of you
translation.zh: 你内心深处某部分

translation.en: that always felt a little different than everybody else.
translation.zh: 总感觉和其他人有点不一样

translation.en: -Part that felt like a weirdo. -[takes deep breath] You don't know shit.
translation.zh: 感觉像个怪胎 你什么也不知道

translation.en: Kid, I know you inside out and backwards.
translation.zh: 小子 你里里外外我都知道

translation.en: You're allergic to bees. You hate cilantro.
translation.zh: 你对蜜蜂过敏 讨厌香菜

translation.en: You always sneeze four times.
translation.zh: 你总是打四次喷嚏

translation.en: Everybody hates cilantro.
translation.zh: 谁都讨厌香菜

translation.en: You're meticulous.
translation.zh: 你小心严谨

translation.en: Thorough, disciplined, relentless.
translation.zh: 周密 有纪律 坚持不懈

translation.en: You love puzzles.
translation.zh: 你喜欢解谜

translation.en: You're a chess player.
translation.zh: 你下棋 对不对？

translation.en: Good, too, I bet.
translation.zh: 我猜下得还挺好

translation.en: But you suffer from insomnia.
translation.zh: 但你一直受失眠的折磨

translation.en: Your mind never lets you sleep.
translation.zh: 你的大脑从不让你睡

translation.en: And even when it does, it attacks you with nightmares.
translation.zh: 即使睡了也遭受噩梦困扰

translation.en: I'm talking 'bout those three-o'clock-in-the-morning,
translation.zh: 我说的是那种凌晨三点

translation.en: somebody-please-save-me kind of nightmares.
translation.zh: 快来人救我那种噩梦

translation.en: And then there's the doubts, and those are the worst.
translation.zh: 还有怀疑 那是最糟糕的

translation.en: You hate 'em, and you hate yourself for having 'em.
translation.zh:
你讨厌它们 你讨厌自己有怀疑
它们让你感觉软弱

translation.en: They make you feel weak.
translation.zh:
你讨厌自己有怀疑
它们让你感觉软弱

translation.en: A real soldier doesn't doubt, right?
translation.zh: 真正的士兵不会怀疑 对吗？

translation.en: The only time... you ever truly feel happy
translation.zh: 你唯一真正感到开心的时候

translation.en: is when you're flat on your belly about to squeeze a trigger.
translation.zh: 就是趴在地上即将扣下扳机时

translation.en: And in that moment... the world makes perfect sense.
translation.zh: 那一刻 世界完全说得通了

translation.en: How do you think I know all of that?
translation.zh: 你觉得我是怎么知道这些呢？

translation.en: I don't give a shit how you know anything.
translation.zh: 我才不在乎你怎么知道

translation.en: Look at me... dummy!
translation.zh: 看着我 蠢蛋

translation.en: Look at us!
translation.zh: 看看我们

translation.en: Twenty-five years ago, your father took my blood
translation.zh: 25年前 你父亲偷了我的血

translation.en: and he cloned me.
translation.zh: 用来复制我

translation.en: He made you from me. Our DNA is identical.
translation.zh: 他用我复制出你 我们的DNA完全一致

translation.en: -He's telling you the truth. -Shut up.
translation.zh:
-他说的是事实
-闭嘴

translation.en: [Henry] He chose me 'cause there's never been anybody like me.
translation.zh: 他选择我是因为没人能超越我

translation.en: And he knew one day I was gonna get old, and then you'd step in.
translation.zh:
他知道我总有一天会变老
那时就用得上你了

translation.en: He's been lying to you the whole time. He told you, you were an orphan.
translation.zh: 他一直在骗你 他跟你说你是孤儿

translation.en: And of all the people in the world to come after me,
translation.zh: 全世界那么多人追杀我

translation.en: -why would he send you? -Because I'm the best.
translation.zh:
-为什么他派你来？
-因为我是最厉害的

translation.en: You are obviously not the best.
translation.zh: 你显然不是最厉害的

translation.en: [exhales] You got a hard-ass head.
translation.zh: 你真是死脑子

translation.en: I guess this was supposed to be your birthday or something.
translation.zh: 估计这应该是你生日什么的

translation.en: I had to die, and you had to do it.
translation.zh: 我必须死 必须你动手

translation.en: As long as I was alive,
translation.zh: 只要我还活着

translation.en: somehow Clay's little experiment was incomplete.
translation.zh: 克莱的小实验就不算完成

translation.en: That's the maniac you're pulling a trigger for.
translation.zh: 你就是在为那个疯子杀人

translation.en: Shut your mouth about him.
translation.zh: 你别跟我说他

translation.en: -You're just trying to rattle me. -I'm trying to save you!
translation.zh:
-你只是想让我慌乱
-我是想救你

translation.en: [exhales sharply] What are you... twenty-three?
translation.zh: 你23岁了吧？

translation.en: Still a virgin, right?
translation.zh: 还是处男吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 看来没错

translation.en: Dying to be in a relationship and connect,
translation.zh: 渴望谈恋爱 与人相通

translation.en: but terrified to let anybody near you.
translation.zh: 却又害怕让任何人靠近

translation.en: Because what if somebody actually saw... who you are?
translation.zh: 因为万一有人看清你的真面目呢？

translation.en: How could they love you?
translation.zh: 他们怎么可能爱你呢？

translation.en: So, everybody's just targets...
translation.zh: 所以每个人都只是目标

translation.en: and you're just a weapon.
translation.zh: 你就只是武器

translation.en: -Hey. Hey! -[ominous music playing]
translation.zh: 嘿…

translation.en: -[Danny] Hey! -[both grunt]
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [grunts] Don't shoot him!
translation.zh: 别开枪

translation.en: [Henry] Don't shoot him!
translation.zh: 别开枪

translation.en: -[Danny] Don't! No! Don't! Drop it! -[Henry grunts]
translation.zh: 不 不要 放下

translation.en: Drop it! I will shoot you!
translation.zh: 放下 不然我开枪了

translation.en: -[groans] -No, you won't!
translation.zh: 不 你不会的

translation.en: Let him go!
translation.zh: 放开他

translation.en: Right now!
translation.zh: 马上

translation.en: [Junior] I'm not you!
translation.zh: 我不是你

translation.en: [Junior] You hear me, old man?
translation.zh: 听到了吗 老头？

translation.en: I'm not you!
translation.zh: 我不是你

translation.en: -[Henry] Where is he? [groans] -[Danny] He's gone.
translation.zh:
-他在哪里？
-他走了

translation.en: -[Henry] Did you hit him? -I think so, yeah.
translation.zh:
-你打中他了吗？
-应该是

translation.en: -[groans] Where? -Shoulder, I think.
translation.zh:
-打中哪里？
-好像是肩膀

translation.en: Then he'll recover.
translation.zh: 那他就能恢复

translation.en: Is that a good thing?
translation.zh: 算是好事吗？

translation.en: it's not every day you see a guy
translation.zh: 要知道 目睹一个人

translation.en: get his ass kicked on two continents... -[Henry continues groaning] -...by himself.
translation.zh: 在两大洲上被自己胖揍可不常见

translation.en: Where to?
translation.zh: 去哪里？

translation.en: Georgia.
translation.zh: 乔治亚州

translation.en: It's where Verris is.
translation.zh: 瓦里斯在那里

translation.en: [Henry sighing] Man.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: That poor kid.
translation.zh: 那可怜的孩子

translation.en: He must be terrified.
translation.zh: 他一定吓坏了

translation.en: And he's going home, walking into a buzz saw.
translation.zh: 而回家后等着他的更可怕

translation.en: I need to get some sleep.
translation.zh: 我得睡一会了

translation.en: You, too.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: Mm. Not me. That's where the ghosts are.
translation.zh: 我不睡 梦里有鬼魂

translation.en: Sleep.
translation.zh: 睡吧

translation.en: [Clay] Tell me something.
translation.zh: 跟我说说

translation.en: Why is it so hard for you to kill this man?
translation.zh: 为什么杀这个人对你这么难？

translation.en: [Junior] You know how much I hate... Big Hammock Park, Pop?
translation.zh: 你知道我多讨厌大吊床公园吗 老爹

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Junior] Ever since I was about 12 years old...
translation.zh: 从12岁开始

translation.en: we would shoot turkeys there... for my birthday.
translation.zh: 每次过生日都去那打火鸡

translation.en: And I always hated it.
translation.zh: 我一直都很讨厌

translation.en: But I was an orphan, right?
translation.zh: 可我是个孤儿 对吗？

translation.en: So, how would we e-- even know when my birthday was?
translation.zh: 那怎么知道我生日是哪天呢？

translation.en: But you never seemed to notice, so we just... keep going.
translation.zh:
但你似乎从未察觉
所以就一直去那里

translation.en: Okay. So, next year, we'll try Chuck E. Cheese.
translation.zh: 好吧 明年生日去吃查克奶酪

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You, me,
translation.zh: 你 我

translation.en: and the lab guys... who made me.
translation.zh: 还有实验室把我造出来的那帮人

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I, um...
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: always believed...
translation.zh: 一直认为

translation.en: you'd be happier not knowing.
translation.zh: 不让你知道你会更快乐

translation.en: Happy.
translation.zh: 快乐

translation.en: You know when I'm happy, Pop?
translation.zh: 老爹 你知道我什么时候快乐吗？

translation.en: When I'm flat on my belly...
translation.zh: 当我趴在地上

translation.en: about to squeeze a trigger.
translation.zh: 即将扣动扳机的那一刻

translation.en: It's the only time I'm happy.
translation.zh: 那是我唯一快乐的时候

translation.en: And this wasn't even a mistake.
translation.zh: 这都算不上什么失误

translation.en: It's not like you got someone pregnant, and then had to man up...
translation.zh:
这跟你把别人肚子搞大
不得不负起责任抚养我不一样

translation.en: and raise me. No, you...
translation.zh:
这跟你把别人肚子搞大
不得不负起责任抚养我不一样 是你做出了决定

translation.en: made a decision...
translation.zh: 是你做出了决定

translation.en: to have a scientist make a person
translation.zh: 让科学家用一个人

translation.en: -out of another person-- -No, that's not what it was.
translation.zh:
-造出另一个人
-不 事情不是这样的

translation.en: That's exactly what it was.
translation.zh: 就是这么一回事

translation.en: Then you sent me...
translation.zh: 然后你派我

translation.en: to kill him. Of all the shooters in the world,
translation.zh: 去杀他 全世界那么多枪手 为何偏偏派我？

translation.en: why would you send me?
translation.zh: 全世界那么多枪手 为何偏偏派我？

translation.en: He's your darkness. You had to walk through this on your own.
translation.zh: 他是你的黑暗 你得靠自己走过去

translation.en: Maybe you're my darkness.
translation.zh: 也许你才是我的黑暗

translation.en: That lie you told me...
translation.zh: 你跟我说的谎

translation.en: that my parents...
translation.zh: 说我父母

translation.en: dumped me... at a fire station.
translation.zh: 把我遗弃在消防站

translation.en: And I believed that.
translation.zh: 我相信了

translation.en: -Do you know how that made me feel? -It was a necessary lie.
translation.zh: 你知道那让我有什么感觉吗？ 那是不得已的谎言

translation.en: None of this shit is necessary!
translation.zh: 这一切都没有什么不得已

translation.en: You made a choice to do this to me. Can't you see how not okay I am?
translation.zh:
你选择了这样对我
你看不见我有多难过吗？

translation.en: Bullshit!
translation.zh: 胡说

translation.en: You forget who you're talking to, Junior. I've seen battle.
translation.zh: 你忘了自己是在跟谁说话 小克 我上过战场 我见过士兵

translation.en: I've seen soldiers go over the edge, because more was being asked of them
translation.zh: 我上过战场 我见过士兵 因为对他们的要求超出了

translation.en: than they could give. That's not you.
translation.zh: 他们的能力而崩溃 但你不会

translation.en: Your world is stable and dependable. I made sure of that.
translation.zh:
你的世界既稳定又可靠
我保证了这一点

translation.en: You have something that Henry himself never had.
translation.zh: 你有亨利从来都没有的东西

translation.en: You have a loving, dedicated, present
translation.zh: 你有一个慈爱 无私 顾家的父亲

translation.en: father, who tells you every goddamn day that you are precious and that you matter.
translation.zh: 每一天都告诉你你有多宝贵 多重要

translation.en: Jesus, the whole point of this thing...
translation.zh:
天啊 这件事的意义
就在于去除亨利的痛苦

translation.en: was to give you all of Henry's gifts without his pain, and I did.
translation.zh:
天啊 这件事的意义
就在于去除亨利的痛苦 把他全部的天赋都给你
而且我做到了

translation.en: Don't... doubt, Junior.
translation.zh: 不要怀疑 小克

translation.en: You're better than that.
translation.zh: 你能做得更好

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: I love you, son.
translation.zh: 我爱你 儿子

translation.en: Just don't let yourself down.
translation.zh: 别让自己失望

translation.en: [Baron] Like so many of my encounters, it was short but sweet.
translation.zh: 就像我的许多艳遇一样 短暂而甜蜜

translation.en: Thanks, baby.
translation.zh: 谢谢 宝贝

translation.en: [Baron] There should be a truck here somewhere.
translation.zh: 这边应该有辆卡车

translation.en: [Junior] Don't move.
translation.zh: 别动

translation.en: -[groans] -What was in that? Bee venom.
translation.zh:
-子弹里面是什么？
-蜂毒

translation.en: [Danny] No. No, you can't do that.
translation.zh: 不…你不能这样

translation.en: -You can't do that. He's allergic! -[Baron] Henry...
translation.zh: 你不能这么做 他过敏

translation.en: -can you breathe? Henry, try to breathe. -[chokes]
translation.zh: 亨利 你能呼吸吗？亨利 试着呼吸

translation.en: -[Baron] You okay? -Please.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-拜托

translation.en: [Baron] Henry.
translation.zh: 亨利 你能呼吸吗？

translation.en: -Henry, can you breathe? -[Danny] Please!
translation.zh: 亨利 你能呼吸吗？ 求你了

translation.en: -[Baron] Try to breathe. Henry! Henry! -[wheezes]
translation.zh: 用力呼吸 亨利…

translation.en: [Baron] Breathe!
translation.zh: 呼吸

translation.en: -[Danny] Why are you doing this? -[Baron] Come on, Henry.
translation.zh:
-你为什么这么做？
-加油 亨利

translation.en: -[Danny] Why are you doing this? -[Baron] Henry. -Henry, breathe. Come on! -[wheezes]
translation.zh:
-你为什么这么做？
-亨利 呼吸

translation.en: [Baron] Hey, hey. Breathe, Henry.
translation.zh: 嘿…呼吸 亨利

translation.en: Epinephrine antihistamine.
translation.zh: 肾上腺素抗组胺剂

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Junior] You'll be fine.
translation.zh: 你会没事的

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I had to be sure.
translation.zh: 我得确认一下

translation.en: No, it's all good.
translation.zh: 好 没事

translation.en: This whole shit has been a little difficult.
translation.zh: 这破事是挺难让人接受的

translation.en: [Baron] I hate to break up the party, but...
translation.zh: 不好意思插个话

translation.en: how the hell do you always know where we are?
translation.zh: 你为什么总能知道我们在哪里？

translation.en: [Junior] They're tracking you.
translation.zh: 他们在追踪你

translation.en: Do you trust me?
translation.zh: 你相信我吗？

translation.en: [Junior] They chipped you...
translation.zh: 三年前做手术时

translation.en: during your surgery three years ago.
translation.zh: 他们给你安了芯片

translation.en: Verris.
translation.zh: 瓦里斯

translation.en: You know him, too?
translation.zh: 你也认识他

translation.en: Panama. Kuwait. Somalia.
translation.zh: 巴拿马 科威特 索马里

translation.en: Can you take us to him?
translation.zh: 你能带我们去找他吗？

translation.en: [Henry] We need to shut him down.
translation.zh: 我们得阻止他

translation.en: -Both of us. -[dramatic music playing]
translation.zh: 我们两个一起

translation.en: You grew up in Philadelphia, right?
translation.zh: 你在费城长大吧？

translation.en: Yep. Place called "The Bottom."
translation.zh: 对 在一个叫底部的地方

translation.en: The Bottom.
translation.zh: 底部

translation.en: Tell me about my mother.
translation.zh: 给我讲讲我母亲

translation.en: Helen Jackson Brogan.
translation.zh: 海伦杰克逊布洛根

translation.en: Worked two jobs for 40 years.
translation.zh: 做两份工作 做了40年

translation.en: That woman used to whoop my ass.
translation.zh: 她以前总打我屁股

translation.en: Did you deserve it?
translation.zh:
-是不是该打？
-通常是

translation.en: Usually. Does being angry and stupid
translation.zh:
-是不是该打？
-通常是 臭脾气还特别蠢

translation.en: and never really trying at anything mean you deserve it?
translation.zh: 什么事都不上心是不是该打？

translation.en: Our father wasn't around much. He left when I was five.
translation.zh:
我们的父亲不常在家
我五岁的时候他就离开了

translation.en: And I think every time she looked at me, she just saw him, so...
translation.zh: 我觉得她每次看到我就仿佛看到他

translation.en: I had to get the hell out of there.
translation.zh: 我不得不离开那里

translation.en: Joined the corps.
translation.zh: 参了军

translation.en: -First time I ever made any real friends. -Hoorah.
translation.zh: 第一次结交了真正的朋友

translation.en: Met Clay Verris there.
translation.zh: 在那认识了克莱瓦里斯

translation.en: Found something I was really, really good at.
translation.zh: 发现了自己特别擅长的事

translation.en: Time I left, I had medals on my chest...
translation.zh: 退役的时候 勋章挂满了前胸

translation.en: she was gone, and... I had become this.
translation.zh: 她去世了 我成了这个样子

translation.en: You gotta walk away... while you still can.
translation.zh: 你得趁还能脱身的时候尽早脱身

translation.en: -This is all I know. -No, this is all he taught you.
translation.zh:
-我只会这些
-不 他只教了你这些

translation.en: Stop now, you can still... -become something else. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 现在收手 你还能有别的作为

translation.en: Sure. A doctor?
translation.zh: 行啊 医生？律师？

translation.en: -Lawyer? -Husband.
translation.zh: 行啊 医生？律师？ 丈夫 父亲

translation.en: Father.
translation.zh: 丈夫 父亲

translation.en: All the things this job gives you the excuse not to be.
translation.zh: 所有这份工作让你逃避的事

translation.en: I threw all of that away.
translation.zh: 我把那些都抛弃了

translation.en: It'd be a shame to waste these gifts a second time around.
translation.zh:
第二次机会再浪费这些天赋
就太可惜了

translation.en: I'm sorry, what is your name?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: It's always been Junior.
translation.zh: 一直都叫我小克

translation.en: Clay Junior.
translation.zh: 小克莱

translation.en: I don't really know anymore.
translation.zh: 我也不知道自己是谁了

translation.en: That's another really good reason to quit.
translation.zh: 又一个退出的好理由

translation.en: [Junior] You sure about this?
translation.zh: 你确定要这样吗？

translation.en: [Henry] I need to talk to him.
translation.zh: 我得跟他谈谈

translation.en: So, what happens when we get to him?
translation.zh: 我们见到他之后要怎么办？

translation.en: He's not gonna surrender.
translation.zh: 他是不会投降的

translation.en: It's him. [Baron] Can I talk to him?
translation.zh:
-是他
-我能跟他通话吗？

translation.en: I want to be the one to tell him we're all BFFs now.
translation.zh: 我想亲口告诉他我们现在是死党了

translation.en: -[cell phone continues to ring] -Take it.
translation.zh: 接吧

translation.en: -This is Junior. -[Clay] Are you with Brogan?
translation.zh:
我是小克 -你和布洛根在一起吗？
-我为什么要跟他在一起？

translation.en: Why would I be with him? You sent me to kill him, didn't you?
translation.zh:
-你和布洛根在一起吗？
-我为什么要跟他在一起？ -你不是派我去杀他吗？
-不重要了 快跑

translation.en: [Clay] Doesn't matter. Just run.
translation.zh:
-你不是派我去杀他吗？
-不重要了 快跑

translation.en: -What? -[Clay] Run. Get away from him, now.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-跑 离他远点 快

translation.en: -Junior, I just want you safe. -[Junior] Why?
translation.zh: 小克 我只想让你安全无事 为什么？

translation.en: Because I'm your favorite experiment?
translation.zh: 因为我是你最爱的实验品

translation.en: [Clay] No, because I'm your father and you need to listen to me. Run!
translation.zh: 不 因为我是你父亲 你要听我话 快跑

translation.en: -[Junior] Get out of the car! -[Henry] Go, go!
translation.zh:
-下车
-快

translation.en: Baron! [pants] No!
translation.zh: 巴隆 不要

translation.en: [Danny] Come on!
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: I'm sorry, Henry.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 亨利

translation.en: [grunts] Shit!
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: [man 1] Move out. Go! Go!
translation.zh: 下车 快

translation.en: -[Clay] Chief Mitchell? -[Mitchell] Go ahead.
translation.zh:
-米切尔队长
-请讲

translation.en: Clay Verris. I need your units to stand down.
translation.zh:
我是克莱瓦里斯
我要你的小队撤退

translation.en: -[Mitchell] Sir? -We're engaging with a terror cell
translation.zh:
-长官
-我们正在对付一个

translation.en: that has a weaponized biological capability.
translation.zh: 拥有生物武器的恐怖组织

translation.en: [Mitchell] All units, fall back immediately.
translation.zh: 各单位 立即撤退

translation.en: [Clay] Federal authorities have been notified and are en route.
translation.zh: 已经通知联邦当局 他们正在路上

translation.en: [Mitchell] Affirmative. Keep me posted, Clay.
translation.zh: 收到 保持联络 克莱

translation.en: [Clay] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 好的 长官

translation.en: [Junior] You gotta stand your men down now.
translation.zh: 你得让手下的人撤退

translation.en: You did the right thing, Junior, walking away from him.
translation.zh: 小克 你做了正确选择 离开了他

translation.en: I did what a coward would do.
translation.zh: 我做了懦夫做的事

translation.en: -Makes me sick! -I was asking too much of you.
translation.zh: 让我恶心 我对你要求过高了

translation.en: I can see that now.
translation.zh: 我现在明白了

translation.en: He deserves better than a missile shot into his car, Pop.
translation.zh: 他不该在车上被导弹炸死 老爹

translation.en: It doesn't matter what he deserves. He has to die.
translation.zh: 他怎么死不重要 他必须死

translation.en: -Are you gonna call those goons off now? -No. But you can.
translation.zh: 现在你可以命令那些杀手撤退了吗？ 不 但你可以

translation.en: Just fire that. Take command.
translation.zh: 只要开枪 接管指挥

translation.en: [Henry] Armor is weak at the joints. Eyes and neck are the kill shots.
translation.zh:
装甲的弱点在接缝处
击中眼睛和脖子最致命

translation.en: Take right, I take left.
translation.zh: 你负责右边 我负责左边

translation.en: [Henry] Muzzle discipline.
translation.zh: 记住枪战准则

translation.en: Watch your round count. You set, I spike.
translation.zh: 注意还剩几发子弹 你装子弹 我进攻

translation.en: -Ready? -Roger that.
translation.zh:
-准备好了吗？
-了解

translation.en: -[Danny] I'm out! -[Henry] Take cover!
translation.zh:
-没子弹了
-找掩护

translation.en: Set!
translation.zh: 装好了

translation.en: [Danny] Frag out!
translation.zh: 扔手雷

translation.en: -I am trying to make you a man! -[grunts]
translation.zh: 我是想让你成为男子汉

translation.en: I should've cloned myself.
translation.zh: 我应该复制我自己

translation.en: "Loving, dedicated, present father."
translation.zh: “慈爱 无私 顾家的父亲”

translation.en: [man 4] Right side!
translation.zh: 右边

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 动手

translation.en: How many rounds you got left? [pants]
translation.zh: 你还剩多少子弹？

translation.en: One.
translation.zh: 一发

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-对不起
-为什么？

translation.en: -For getting you into this. -I was the one surveilling you.
translation.zh:
-把你卷进这事
-是我先监视你

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Anyway... sorry.
translation.zh: 不过还是对不起

translation.en: Now let's fight our way out of this thing.
translation.zh: 现在我们一起杀出去吧

translation.en: You're a great partner.
translation.zh: 你是个很棒的搭档

translation.en: [Henry] Thank you. Sorry I ran.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-抱歉我跑掉了

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's been a rough night. How many more out there?
translation.zh:
没关系 今晚战局混乱 -外面还有多少人
-我看没有了

translation.en: I didn't see any.
translation.zh:
-外面还有多少人
-我看没有了

translation.en: [Henry] Verris?
translation.zh: 瓦里斯呢？

translation.en: Out of commission.
translation.zh: 昏迷了

translation.en: But still alive?
translation.zh: 但还活着吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: How bad is that? I'm fine.
translation.zh:
-伤势严重吗？
-我没事

translation.en: You're not.
translation.zh: 你有事

translation.en: Hold the elevated position. We're gonna secure an out.
translation.zh: 在高处守着 我们得保住出口

translation.en: Back off!
translation.zh: 退后

translation.en: Don't you feel pain?
translation.zh: 你感觉不到痛吗？

translation.en: [Clay] I don't know why you're so angry,
translation.zh: 我不知道你为何如此生气 亨利

translation.en: You were the inspiration for all of this.
translation.zh: 这一切的灵感都源自于你

translation.en: You know where I got the idea? Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你知道我怎么想到的吗？你还好吗？

translation.en: Khafji.
translation.zh: 卡夫奇

translation.en: Watching you go house to house, wishing I had a whole division of men
translation.zh:
看着你挨家挨户战斗
真希望我能有一支精锐部队

translation.en: all as good as you.
translation.zh: 所有人都像你一样优秀

translation.en: Wondering if that could be possible.
translation.zh: 我想看看这能不能实现

translation.en: -You should be flattered. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 你该感到荣幸

translation.en: You should be dead. [Clay] You saw what happened over there.
translation.zh:
-你该去死
-你看见当时的情景了

translation.en: Atrocities.
translation.zh: 血腥暴行

translation.en: Friends being sent home in a pine box.
translation.zh: 用棺材把朋友们送回家

translation.en: Why should we accept that... if there's a better way?
translation.zh:
如果有更好的出路
我们为何要接受那一切？

translation.en: And look what we created.
translation.zh: 看看我们创造了什么

translation.en: He's got both of us in him.
translation.zh: 他身上有你和我的影子

translation.en: Don't you think your country deserves...
translation.zh:
你不觉得祖国值得拥有
一个完美版的你吗？

translation.en: -perfect version of you? -There is no perfect version of me.
translation.zh:
你不觉得祖国值得拥有
一个完美版的你吗？ 没有什么完美版的我

translation.en: Or him. Or anybody. [Clay] No?
translation.zh:
-完美版的他 或是任何人
-没有吗？

translation.en: He was on his way to Yemen. Now, thanks to you,
translation.zh: 他本该前往也门 现在拜你所赐

translation.en: his place is gonna be taken by someone with parents.
translation.zh: 某对父母的孩子将代替他征战

translation.en: Someone who feels pain... fear,
translation.zh:
这个人能感受到痛苦和恐惧
而我们去除了他的这些知觉

translation.en: which we had edited out of him. Someone with just as many weaknesses
translation.zh:
这个人能感受到痛苦和恐惧
而我们去除了他的这些知觉 这个人身上的弱点

translation.en: as the terrorists that we're trying to kill. And you're gonna tell me that's better?
translation.zh:
和我们要杀戮的恐怖分子一样多
你要告诉我这样更好吗？

translation.en: So, why not make a whole army of them?
translation.zh: 那干脆造出一整支军队吧

translation.en: Yeah. Why not?
translation.zh: 对 为什么不呢？

translation.en: Think how many American families we could spare.
translation.zh: 想想我们能让多少美国家庭免于参战

translation.en: Nobody's son or daughter would ever have to die.
translation.zh: 不用再牺牲谁家的儿子或女儿

translation.en: No vet comes home with PTSD and kills himself.
translation.zh:
不会再有老兵退役回乡
患上创伤后应激障碍再自杀

translation.en: We can keep the whole world safe without any actual grief.
translation.zh:
我们保卫世界安全
也不会带来现实中的不幸

translation.en: So, who would I be hurting?
translation.zh: 所以…我伤害了谁？

translation.en: You're talking about people, Clay.
translation.zh: 你谈论的可是人 克莱

translation.en: Henry...
translation.zh: 亨利

translation.en: this is the most humane thing that Gemini's ever done.
translation.zh: 这是双子座做过的最人道的事

translation.en: How many more of me are running around out there?
translation.zh: 外面还有多少像我一样的人？

translation.en: There's only one you, Junior.
translation.zh: 只有一个你 小克

translation.en: He was a weapon.
translation.zh: 他只是个武器

translation.en: You're my son.
translation.zh: 你是我儿子

translation.en: And I love you...
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: as much as any father ever loved any kid.
translation.zh: 如同所有爱孩子的父亲一样

translation.en: I don't have a father.
translation.zh: 我没有父亲

translation.en: Goodbye, Clay. [Henry] Hey, hey.
translation.zh:
-再见 克莱
-嘿

translation.en: So, what the hell are we gonna do, huh?
translation.zh: 那我们要怎么做？

translation.en: Gonna turn him in?
translation.zh: 将他归罪？

translation.en: They're not gonna try him. They're not gonna shut down his lab.
translation.zh:
他不会受到审讯
他们不会关掉他的实验室

translation.en: -We have to end this right now. -[Henry] Hey.
translation.zh:
-我们现在得了结这一切
-嘿

translation.en: Look at me.
translation.zh: 看着我

translation.en: Look at me.
translation.zh: 看着我

translation.en: You pull that trigger,
translation.zh: 你扣下扳机

translation.en: and you're gonna break something inside of yourself...
translation.zh: 就会破坏你内心的一部分

translation.en: that'll never get fixed again.
translation.zh: 再也无法愈合

translation.en: Don't.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: Let it go.
translation.zh: 放手吧

translation.en: Give it to me.
translation.zh: 把枪给我

translation.en: You don't want those ghosts.
translation.zh: 你不想被鬼魂缠上的

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: [Henry] You should know better than that.
translation.zh: 你知道不该喝酒

translation.en: Surprised you give a shit.
translation.zh: 很惊讶你还在乎

translation.en: Well, we can't be friends anymore.
translation.zh: 我们再也不能做朋友了

translation.en: Because you did let them try to kill me.
translation.zh: 因为你没阻止他们杀我

translation.en: But doesn't mean I want to see you drink yourself to death.
translation.zh: 但不意味着我想看到你把自己喝死

translation.en: The Gemini lab's been dismantled.
translation.zh: 双子座实验室被拆了

translation.en: Cloning program is history.
translation.zh: 克隆项目已成历史

translation.en: And Junior?
translation.zh: 那小克呢？

translation.en: He's untouchable. No one will bother him... ever.
translation.zh: 没人能动他 再也没人去打扰他

translation.en: And we checked. There are no more clones.
translation.zh: 我们查过了 没有其他克隆人了

translation.en: What about you?
translation.zh: 那你呢？

translation.en: IG called.
translation.zh: 检察长来电了

translation.en: I'm looking at charges, but if I bury Janet...
translation.zh: 我要被起诉了 但如果我供出珍妮特 就能争取脱罪

translation.en: I can make a deal.
translation.zh: 但如果我供出珍妮特 就能争取脱罪

translation.en: Well, she earned it.
translation.zh: 她活该

translation.en: I'm really sorry, Henry.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉 亨利

translation.en: -Take care, Del. -Yeah. You, too.
translation.zh:
-保重 德尔
-你也是

translation.en: And happy retirement.
translation.zh: 祝你退休愉快

translation.en: [Danny] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Henry] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Uh, congrats on the promotion. I hear they got big plans.
translation.zh:
恭喜升职 我听说
他们制定了宏大计划

translation.en: Well, after you, -pretty sure I can handle anything. -[Henry chuckles]
translation.zh: 和你经历过这段 没什么我搞不定

translation.en: How have you been?
translation.zh:
-你过得怎么样？
-很好

translation.en: Good. I just, uh, settled Baron's estate,
translation.zh: 我刚处理完巴隆的后事

translation.en: scattered his ashes in the Caribbean.
translation.zh:
把他的骨灰撒在了加勒比海
我不知道

translation.en: I don't know. All I want to do now is put some good in the world.
translation.zh: 现在我只想为世界做点贡献

translation.en: I just got to figure out how.
translation.zh: 我只需要找到方法

translation.en: -Yeah, you will. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 你会找到的

translation.en: You sleeping okay? Uh, better.
translation.zh:
-你睡得还好吗？
-好些了

translation.en: -No ghosts? -Not like before.
translation.zh:
-没有鬼魂？
-不像以前那样了

translation.en: And I actually looked in a mirror the other day.
translation.zh: 还有前几天 我居然照镜子了

translation.en: -Really? -It wasn't horrendous.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-没什么可怕的

translation.en: Speaking of mirrors...
translation.zh: 说到镜子…

translation.en: -[Junior] Catch you later. -[boy] See you later, man.
translation.zh:
-待会见
-待会见

translation.en: [Junior] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -What's this? -This is you.
translation.zh:
-这是什么？
-这是你

translation.en: Passport, birth certificate, driver's license.
translation.zh: 护照、出生证明、驾照

translation.en: -Apparently you got pretty good credit. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 据说你的信用记录不错

translation.en: I love the name you chose.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你选的这个名字

translation.en: Jackson?
translation.zh: 杰克逊 这是我母亲的姓

translation.en: -It was my mother's name. -Hey, she was my mother first.
translation.zh: 杰克逊 这是我母亲的姓 喂 她先是我的母亲

translation.en: -[chuckles] Yeah, yeah. -Don't you "yeah, yeah" me, young man.
translation.zh:
-是啊
-别敷衍我 年轻人

translation.en: Come on. I know a great place for lunch.
translation.zh: 走吧 我知道一家吃午饭的好餐厅

translation.en: -So, you settled on a major yet? -Oh, leaning towards engineering.
translation.zh:
-你选定专业了？
-倾向于选工程学

translation.en: -Engineering? -Uh.
translation.zh: 工程学？

translation.en: Yeah, you should listen to her.
translation.zh: 对 你该听她的

translation.en: Uh, if I were you, which I sort of am, I'd go with computer science.
translation.zh:
我要是你 在某种意义上我就是你
我会学计算机科学

translation.en: [Danny] Save that for grad school.
translation.zh: 那是读研究生的事

translation.en: -You want to start in humanities. -Okay, don't listen to her.
translation.zh:
-你该从人文学科起步
-别听她的

translation.en: -Don't listen to him. -Guys?
translation.zh:
-别听他的才对
-各位

translation.en: -You need a grounding in the classics. -Well, excuse me, -I'm trying to talk with myself here. -Guys.
translation.zh:
-你需要学习经典打基础
-我在跟我自己讨论呢

translation.en: You're talking to yourself, but you're not talking to him.
translation.zh: 对 你在自说自话 而不是对他说话

translation.en: Look, I-- I just made a lot of mistakes when I was young--
translation.zh: 我年轻时犯过很多错

translation.en: And I'd actually like to make some of those mistakes myself.
translation.zh: 实际上 有些错误我想自己去经历

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is, I made them already, so you don't have to.
translation.zh: 我想说的是 你不必重蹈我的覆辙

translation.en: -Yeah, but he's not you. -[Junior] Okay, everybody.
translation.zh:
-但他不是你
-好了 两位

translation.en: Chill the hell out.
translation.zh: 冷静冷静

translation.en: I'm gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 我不会有事

translation.en: If you're okay...
translation.zh: 你没事

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我就没事

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Henry] What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I just can't believe that in 30 years, I'm gonna look like you.
translation.zh:
我只是不敢相信30年后
我会长成你这样

translation.en: -What? Please. You wish. -[Junior chuckling]
translation.zh: 什么？拜托 你倒想呢

translation.en: Boy, you better hope you look like me in-- in 30 years.
translation.zh: 小子 你最好祈祷30年后能像我一样

translation.en: This is 50-year-old, mature man meat you're looking at.
translation.zh: 站在你面前的是个50岁的成熟猛男

translation.en: -[Danny] Fifty-one. -[Henry] I brush, I floss, I work hard.
translation.zh: 是51岁 我认真刷牙 用牙线 我努力工作

translation.en: When you're 50, I bet you won't be dragging your ass
translation.zh: 等你到了50岁 我打赌你不会

translation.en: around the track every morning like I do.
translation.zh: 像我一样每天早上爬起来跑步

translation.en: In fact, we can race now.
translation.zh: 其实我们现在就可以赛跑

translation.en: We can race right now. We'll take it to the corner right now.
translation.zh: 马上就跑 现在就跑去那个拐角
